definitions.definition: an important job, especially a military one, that someone is sent somewhere to do:
examples: Your mission is to isolate the enemy by destroying all the bridges across the river.

definitions.definition: any work that someone believes it is their duty to do:
examples: My mission in life is to educate the rich about the suffering of the poor.

definitions.definition: something that you say when you have finished doing something that you were told to do:
examples: Mission accomplished. I've got everything you asked for on the list.
